document.full_text: texas lawmakers will head into a special legislative session on tuesday after they failed to come to an agreement on legislation linked to the state budget, lieutenant governor david dewhurst said on monday.
document.title: texas lawmakers to return for special session
lines_and_colors: texas lawmakers will head into a special legislative session on tuesday after they failed to come to an agreement on legislation linked to the state budget, lieutenant governor david dewhurst said on monday.
